import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update an existing filter"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/filters/{FilterId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing filter definition (facet) so you can rename it, move it into a different category, or tweak UI metadata without creating a new key. This preserves saved views, rule conditions, and other references that rely on the existing `FilterId`.

**Prerequisites**
1. **FilterId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/filters/for/entitytype/\{entityTypeId\}](/docs/api/filters/list-filters-for-entity-type) and extract `Items[].FilterId` for the filter you want to update.

**Workflow Example**
1. List filters for the entity type and capture the `FilterId` to update.
2. Build a `FilterDefinition` with only the fields you want to change (for example, `Name`, `CategoryId`, or visibility flags).
3. Save the update: [POST /api/v1.0/filters/\{FilterId\}](/docs/api/filters/update-filter).

**Minimal Required Fields**: `FilterId` (path) plus at least one field in the body to update (commonly `Name` or `CategoryId`).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"FilterId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Definition of a single facet that can be applied to ticket or asset searches.","properties":{"FilterId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the filter definition.","example":"bc0539f5-4b4f-ec11-9820-0003ffe402cf"},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the filter has been disabled.","example":false},"Key":{"type":"string","description":"Facet key used in search payloads.","example":"customfielddatetime"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the filter shown in the UI.","example":"Custom Fields - Date Time"},"Sublabel":{"type":"string","description":"Secondary label or helper text displayed beneath the filter name when provided."},"Description":{"type":"string","description":"Extended description of the filter."},"Recommended":{"type":"boolean","description":"True when the filter is highlighted in the UI as a recommended facet.","example":false},"PluralizeValues":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether value labels should be pluralized when multiple selections are made.","example":false},"CategoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the category the filter belongs to when categorized."},"Category":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Metadata that groups filters into logical buckets such as asset filters, location filters, and workflow filters.","properties":{"Scope":{"type":"string","description":"Visibility scope for the filter category (for example, `Global` or `Site`).","example":"Global"},"CategoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the category.","example":"88887282-4125-4562-93de-100db1b50001"},"Level":{"type":"integer","description":"Hierarchy level for nested categories. `0` represents a top-level category.","example":0},"SortOrder":{"type":"integer","description":"Ordering hint used when rendering categories in the UI.","example":0},"ParentCategoryName":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the parent category when nested. Empty when the category is top-level."},"CategoryTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the category type definition.","example":"3b5a7282-4125-4562-93de-8e8db1b5c908"},"CategoryTypeName":{"type":"string","description":"Display label for the category type.","example":"Filters"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the category as shown in UI filter pickers.","example":"Asset filters"},"Description":{"type":"string","description":"Additional descriptive text for the category when provided."},"Icon":{"type":"string","description":"Font Awesome icon class used by the UI when rendering the category.","example":"fa fa-laptop"},"NameWithParent":{"type":"string","description":"Full display label including the parent category when applicable.","example":"Asset filters"},"AppId":{"type":"string","description":"Identifier of the app providing the category when scoped to an application. Empty for core categories."}},"required":["CategoryId","Name","Scope"],"title":"FilterCategory"}],"description":"Category metadata for the filter. Present when the filter is grouped in the UI."},"FilterTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the filter type used to capture input.","example":"9999d1ac-91aa-e711-80c2-100dffa00003"},"FilterType":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Details about how a filter should capture user input (for example, date range or select list).","properties":{"FilterTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the filter type.","example":"9999d1ac-91aa-e711-80c2-100dffa00003"},"Key":{"type":"string","description":"Internal key describing the filter input control.","example":"daterange"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the filter type.","example":"Date range"},"Description":{"type":"string","description":"Optional description of the filter type."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the filter type was created.","example":"2019-01-20T06:22:02.46"},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the filter type definition was last updated.","example":"2019-01-20T06:22:02.46"}},"required":["FilterTypeId","Key","Name"],"title":"FilterType"}],"description":"Filter type metadata including control name and key."},"TargetFlags":{"type":"array","description":"Optional collection of flags describing additional targeting metadata for the filter.","items":{"type":"string"},"example":[]},"Scope":{"type":"string","description":"Scope for the filter definition (for example, `System` or `Global`).","example":"System"},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the product or module that provides the filter."},"SearchPriority":{"type":"integer","description":"Ranking value used to order filters in the UI.","example":100},"SearchMaxResults":{"type":"integer","description":"Maximum number of values returned when the facet loads selectable options.","example":3},"EntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the entity type that this filter targets. When omitted, the filter may be used across multiple entity types."},"CacheAvailableSelectionsOnEdit":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the UI caches available selections when the filter is edited.","example":true},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the filter was created.","example":"2021-11-27T06:33:42.68"},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the filter was last modified.","example":"2021-11-27T06:33:42.68"},"OriginId":{"type":"string","description":"Identifier of the upstream source record when synchronized from another system."},"OriginSourceId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the upstream integration that provided the filter definition.","example":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"}},"required":["FilterId","IsDeleted","Key","Name","Scope"],"title":"FilterDefinition"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
